amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Title IV, subtitle F, which would allow the SEC to require disclosure of political contributions made by public corporations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to strike Title IV, subtitle F, which would allow the SEC to require disclosure of political contributions made by public corporations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 238 (Roll no. 113).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 238 (Roll no. 113).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Davidson (OH).
